name: カロリー城
description:
Controls:

-Keyboard: Arrow keys + Z / X + Spacebar

-Controller: D-pad / Control stick + A / B + Start

Note! Still in early development, expect a few rough edges. That said, all feedback is welcome! Will provide more information soon with an instruction booklet. Input device will be chosen by pressing any key on the keyboard or controller of choice.

Credit to twitter.com/marsthefennekin for the music!

Tips:

The boot upgrade is a double-jump that uses up one calorie per jump. Also, you can't attack in mid-air after a double-jump.

To defeat the fat dragons, you have to attack the head or else you'll bounce off their big tummy.

This is an oldschool throwback, so a few things like fixed jump arcs and sprites popping in at the screen's edges are intentional throwbacks; they're features, not bugs, I swear!
